samples.description: This sample generates five hand-picked terrains with different characteristic. It's a great display of how the materials used by the terrains might influence its mood.
This sample repeatedly creates completely random terraced terrains. It's a great display of the tool's capabilities and the different types of terrains it can create.
This sample simply creates completely random terraced terrains every five seconds. It's a great display of the tool's capabilities and the different types of terrains it can create.
